name: Gardevoir
description: The Embrace Pokémon. Gardevoir has the ability to read the future. If it senses impending danger to its Trainer, this Pokémon is said to unleash its psychokinetic energy at full power.

abilities.name: Synchronize
abilities.description: If this Pokémon becomes burned, paralyzed, or poisoned, its attacker receives the negative status condition as well (if not immune).

abilities.name: Trace
abilities.description: This Pokémon copies a random ability of an opponent when entering battle. The ability cannot be Flower Gift, Forecast, Illusion, Imposter, Multitype, Trace, Wonder Guard, or Zen Mode.

abilities.name: Telepathy
abilities.description: This Pokémon cannot be damaged by its allies' attacks.
